name: read binary file from application server
code:
LLLLwwwwZZZDATA: ${dataset} TYPE string,
      ${contents} TYPE xstring.
" open the binary file for reading it
OPEN DATASET ${dataset} FOR INPUT IN BINARY MODE.
IF sy-subrc <> 0.
  " todo not found
ELSE.
  " read the contents at once
  READ DATASET ${dataset} INTO ${contents}.
  ${cursor} " what should be done here?
  CLOSE DATASET ${dataset}.
ENDIF.
